entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is the one who put his weight gingerly on the leg and didn’t wince.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a professor who was overenthusiastic and got knocked out.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the one who asked about Professor Snape’s condition.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is a person who checked Snape's pulse and decided not to revive him.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is the one who suggested chaining two people to the spot.

entities.name: pettigrew
entities.description: Pettigrew is a person who was nudged by Black with his toe.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: The Invisibility Cloak is an object that Lupin picked up and tucked into his pocket.

relationships.description: Black nudged Pettigrew with his toe.
Ron put his weight gingerly on Snape's leg.
Lupin picked up the Invisibility Cloak.
Black suggested chaining Ron to the spot.
Lupin agreed to be chained to the spot with Pettigrew.
